text: Aur jab hum ney bani israeel say wada liya kay tum Allah Taalaa kay siwa doosray ki ibadat na kerna aur maa baap kay sath acha sulook kerna issi tarah qarabat daron yateemon aur miskeenon kay sath aur logon ko achi baaten kehna namazen qaeem rakhna aur zakat detay raha kerna lekin thoray say logon kay ilawa tum sab phir gaye aur mun mor liya
